body_html:
those dlls don't exist on my system anywhere, so was unable to add them to PATH.
I downloaded cuda_8.0.61_win10 in hopes of grabbing those dlls...
https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-downloads
installer recommended a different specific version of visual studio
https://www.visualstudio.com/thank-you-downloading-visual-studio/?sku=Community&rel=15
cuda install failed because the above version of VS is 17 and cuda wants <=2015.
Found a version of 2015
http://download.cnet.com/Visual-Studio-Community-2015/3055-2212_4-76440611.html?tag=pdl-redir
Reinstalled the CUDA package
Came closer and got a few more packages successfully found, but issue did not resolve...

I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\dso_loader.cc:135] successfully opened CUDA library cublas64_80.dll locally I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\dso_loader.cc:126] Couldn't open CUDA library cudnn64_5.dll I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_dnn.cc:3517] Unable to load cuDNN DSO I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\dso_loader.cc:135] successfully opened CUDA library cufft64_80.dll locally I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\dso_loader.cc:126] Couldn't open CUDA library nvcuda.dll I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_diagnostics.cc:165] hostname: DESKTOP-HMIARON

body:
those dlls don't exist on my system anywhere, so was unable to add them to PATH.
I downloaded cuda_8.0.61_win10 in hopes of grabbing those dlls...
https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-downloads
installer recommended a different specific version of visual studio
https://www.visualstudio.com/thank-you-downloading-visual-studio/?sku=Community&rel=15
cuda install failed because the above version of VS is 17 and cuda wants <=2015.
Found a version of 2015 
http://download.cnet.com/Visual-Studio-Community-2015/3055-2212_4-76440611.html?tag=pdl-redir
Reinstalled the CUDA package
Came closer and got a few more packages successfully found, but issue did not resolve...

`I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\dso_loader.cc:135] successfully opened CUDA library cublas64_80.dll locally
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\dso_loader.cc:126] Couldn't open CUDA library cudnn64_5.dll
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_dnn.cc:3517] Unable to load cuDNN DSO
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\dso_loader.cc:135] successfully opened CUDA library cufft64_80.dll locally
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\dso_loader.cc:126] Couldn't open CUDA library nvcuda.dll
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_diagnostics.cc:165] hostname: DESKTOP-HMIARON`
